textBeforeTable: These Smelting Tongss are sold by Imperial vendors and handed out by crafting trainers to low level gifted to get them started. Starter Smelting TongsEdit [show] Contents These metal tools are used to make metal bars from ore at the Smelter using the Smelting skill. To use one, you must meet the minimum skill in Smelting. Anvil Machine: N/A Dragon Ability: Smithing Hammer Tool: Metalworking Skill: N/A Hoard Value: 10 Bulk: Smelter Used With: N/A Level Required: Smelting Tool Type: Smelting Tongs
